ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards and Pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: You should have a backpack full of flutes and drums in the bank, silly billy ... From: Christopher Sanders  To:
ygData.messageBody:
You should have a backpack full of flutes and drums in the bank, silly billy
:-)

----- Original Message -----
From: "Christopher Sanders" <christopher.sanders@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2001 4:38 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards and Pulling


> Heh..yeah, I just stood there and took it. I managed to type "stay back"
> but with about 3 or 4 random typo's thrown in before dying. I don't
stress
> death...course, that time, no cleric was available (or willing *grrr*) to
> give rezzes that night. Everyone says how great selos is for CR, and it
> is...but it's amazingly, ploddingly slow when you're running from Firona
to
> Dalnirs (through WW is the worst), and used to Selos with the MM
> drums...hehe.
